meta.title: PORTOFOLIO_ by siddharthmhjn.com
meta.description: Genius, Billionaire, Philanthropist. CEO of Stark Industries and Iron Man.
meta.keywords: Tony Stark, Iron Man, Stark Industries, Arc Reactor, Avengers, AI, J.A.R.V.I.S., Nanotechnology

person.name: Tony Stark
person.description: I am Iron Man. Genius inventor, CEO of Stark Industries, and founding member of the Avengers. I build cutting-edge technology that protects the world and powers the future.

about.heading: My Origin Story...
about.description: Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. After being held captive in Afghanistan, I built the first Iron Man suit in a cave with a box of scraps. That experience changed everything - I went from weapons manufacturer to Earth's greatest defender. I've pioneered arc reactor technology, created J.A.R.V.I.S. and F.R.I.D.A.Y., and led the Avengers against cosmic threats.

mission.title: World Protection
mission.description: Building armor around the world - one suit at a time

growth.title: Infinite Innovation
growth.description: If it doesn't exist yet, I'll invent it. Simple as that.

funFacts.text: My AI assistants are better than your AI assistants
Built my first circuit board at age 4

experience.title: CEO & Lead Inventor
experience.description: Transformed Stark Industries from a weapons manufacturer to the world's leading clean energy and advanced technology company. Invented the arc reactor, created 85+ Iron Man suits, and pioneered AI systems.

experience.title: Founding Member
experience.description: Co-founded Earth's Mightiest Heroes. Led the team through the Battle of New York, Ultron crisis, and the fight against Thanos. Made the sacrifice play when it mattered most.

experience.title: Quantum Engineer
experience.description: Cracked the code for time travel when everyone said it was impossible. Designed the Time-Space GPS that enabled the Avengers to retrieve the Infinity Stones and save half of all life in the universe.

projectsSection.heading: My Greatest Inventions ü¶æ
projectsSection.description: Here's some stuff I built (that didn't try to destroy the world... mostly)

projects.title: Iron Man Armor Series
projects.description: 85+ iterations of the world's most advanced powered exoskeleton. Features flight, weapons systems, AI integration, and nanotech. Built the first one in a cave. With a box of scraps.

projects.title: J.A.R.V.I.S. AI System
projects.description: Just A Rather Very Intelligent System - my AI assistant that manages everything from suit operations to making my coffee. Eventually became Vision. You're welcome, world.

projects.title: Arc Reactor Technology
projects.description: Miniaturized a particle accelerator to fit in my chest. Powers the suits, powers buildings, powers the future. Clean, unlimited energy - you're welcome, planet Earth.

projects.title: Hulkbuster Armor (Veronica)
projects.description: When your friend turns into an angry green rage monster, you need a bigger suit. Modular, deployable from orbit, and surprisingly effective at restraining Hulk. Mostly.

projects.title: Time-Space GPS
projects.description: Everyone said time travel was impossible. I figured it out in one night. This device navigates the quantum realm for precise temporal displacement. Used it to save half the universe.

projects.title: F.R.I.D.A.Y. & EDITH
projects.description: Female Replacement Intelligent Digital Assistant Youth - my new AI after J.A.R.V.I.S. became Vision. EDITH controls a global defense network. Even Dead I'm The Hero.

testimonials.name: Steve Rogers
testimonials.text: The most annoying person I've ever met, but also one of the bravest. When it mattered most, he made the sacrifice play.

testimonials.name: Pepper Potts
testimonials.text: Behind the armor was the most selfless person I've ever known. I watched him grow from having everything to giving everything.

testimonials.name: Peter Parker
testimonials.text: Mr. Stark believed in me when no one else did. He gave me a chance and showed me what it really means to be a hero.

contact.heading: Let's Talk Business üíº
contact.description: Got a world-ending threat? Need clean energy solutions? Want to license arc reactor tech? Or just want to meet a genius? Reach out - Pepper will probably respond.

formMessages.success: Message received! I'll get back to you faster than I can suit up (that's pretty fast). ü¶æ
formMessages.error: Oops! Looks like Ultron is interfering with our systems. Try emailing tony@starkindustries.com directly.

message.label: Tell me what you need *
message.placeholder: Describe your project, threat level, or business proposal. I've seen it all, so don't hold back. üöÄ

contact.funFact: I built my first suit in a cave. Whatever you need, I can probably figure it out over a weekend. ü¶æ

footer.tagline: Genius, Billionaire, Philanthropist. CEO of Stark Industries and Iron Man. Building technology to protect the world and power the future. I am Iron Man.
